author: __flcl
content: Could you guys advise a source of test vectors? Can be cited one, I suppose. It's outdated (proof field is now proofs), so happy to help with updating/adding more

author: inphi
content: Those test vectors were generated using this script - https://github.com/Inphi/blob-utils/blob/master/gen_vectors_test.go.

author: inphi
content: I can update them later today.

author: inphi
content: I don't remember why we have two separate test vectors. But the other one is up to date - https://github.com/Inphi/blob-utils/blob/master/resources/eip4844_test_vectors.json. I'll remove one of them.

author: __flcl
content: Thank you! Looks like I've miss-read the commit history, thought it was 3 months old, not weeks

author: inphi
content: No you're right. It was the other test vector that wasn't updated. That's been fixed now.

author: __flcl
content: Btw, there are get blockbodies and pooled transactions eth_ APIs that contain transactions too, can be good to have in tests probably
